item.title: 香橼研究公司披露比特币买家 MicroStrategy 的空头头寸
item.description: 香橼研究公司（Citron Research）周四在社交媒体平台 X 上发文称，该公司已持有微策略公司（MicroStrategy）的空头头寸。【原文：Citron Research has taken a short position in MicroStrategy , the company said in a post on social media platform X on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局（FAA）局长计划在西雅图会见波音公司首席执行官
item.description: 美国联邦航空局（FAA）局长迈克尔-惠特克（Michael Whitaker）周四表示，随着波音公司恢复737 MAX的生产，他计划很快访问波音公司的西雅图办事处，与首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）会面。【原文：FAA Administrator Michael Whitaker said on Thursday he plans to soon visit Boeing's Seattle offices to meet with CEO Kelly Ortberg as the planemaker resumes 737 MAX production.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，Reddit 有数千用户宕机
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，周四 Reddit 有数千名用户宕机，一天前该社交媒体公司称已修复了最近一次软件更新后出现的一个漏洞。【原文：Reddit was down for thousands of users on Thursday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com, a day after the social media company said it had fixed a bug following a recent software update.】

item.title: 美国财政部对俄罗斯天然气工业银行实施新制裁
item.description: 美国财政部表示，美国周四对俄罗斯天然气银行（Gazprombank）实施了新的制裁，这是对该银行最有力的制裁手段，因为美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）在1月卸任前正加紧行动，惩罚莫斯科入侵乌克兰的行为。【原文：The U.S. imposed fresh sanctions on Russia's Gazprombank on Thursday, the Treasury Department said, wielding its most powerful sanctioning tool against the bank as President Joe Biden steps up actions to punish Moscow for its invasion of Ukraine before leaving office in January.】

item.title: 经济形势严峻，博世将减少 450 名员工的工作时间
item.description: 德国汽车零部件供应商罗伯特-博世公司（ROBG.UL）发言人周四表示，由于经济形势严峻，该公司将从明年春天起减少德国450名员工的工作时间，从而降低他们的工资。【原文：German auto parts supplier Robert Bosch (ROBG.UL) will reduce the hours, and consequently the pay, of 450 employees in Germany from next spring, citing the difficult economic situation, a company spokesperson said on Thursday.】

item.title: 在 COP29 会谈中，贸易需求与气候议程发生冲突
item.description: 据联合国文件和谈判人员称，贸易紧张局势在 COP29 气候峰会上愈演愈烈，中国、巴西和许多发展中国家抱怨说，欧盟的碳边境税等贸易壁垒将破坏气候努力。【原文：Trade tensions are flaring at the COP29 climate summit, with China, Brazil and a host of developing countries complaining that perceived trade barriers, such as the European Union's carbon border levy, will undermine climate efforts, according to U.N. documents and negotiators.】

item.title: 美国 10 月成屋销售反弹
item.description: 由于购房者利用抵押贷款利率短暂下降的机会涌入市场，10 月份美国现房销售大幅反弹，出现了自 2021 年中期以来的首次年度增长。【原文：U.S. existing home sales rebounded sharply in October, posting the first annual gain since mid-2021, as buyers rushed into the market to take advantage of a brief decline in mortgage rates.】

item.title: 雪花公司股价大涨，原因是业绩预测乐观，与 Anthropic 达成人工智能协议
item.description: Snowflake 的股价在周四的盘前交易中大涨超过 24%，此前这家数据分析供应商上调了其年度产品营收预期，表明市场对基于云的数据存储和分析的需求不断增长。【原文：Snowflake's shares surged more than 24% in premarket trading on Thursday after the data analytics provider raised its annual product revenue forecast, signaling growing demand for cloud-based data storage and analytics.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Viatris 在摩洛哥因合并通知被罚款
item.description: 两名官方消息人士周四称，美国制药巨头 Viatris 公司因未向摩洛哥竞争监管机构通报其合并事宜，被摩洛哥竞争监管机构罚款 758 万迪拉姆（约合 76 万美元）。【原文：U.S. pharmaceutical giant Viatris Inc. has been fined 7.58 million dirhams ($760,000) by Morocco's competition regulator for failing to notify it regarding its merger, two official sources said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数意外下降
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量意外下降，这表明就业增长在上个月因飓风和罢工而突然放缓后，很可能在 11 月份出现反弹。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week, suggesting that job growth likely rebounded in November after abruptly slowing last month amid hurricanes and strikes.】

item.title: Elf Beauty 称做空机构 Muddy Waters 的指控 "毫无根据
item.description: 精灵美容公司（Elf Beauty）周四表示，做空机构浑水公司（Muddy Waters）关于该美容公司夸大收入和库存数字的指控 "毫无根据"。【原文：Elf Beauty said on Thursday allegations by short-seller Muddy Waters about the beauty company overstating its revenue and inventory numbers were "without merit".】

item.title: 埃克森公司因塑料回收问题受到抨击，斥资 2 亿美元扩建得克萨斯州工厂
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp）因涉嫌在全球塑料垃圾污染中的作用而面临加利福尼亚州的诉讼，该公司周四表示，将扩大塑料回收利用，从而用废弃瓶子和袋子替代化石燃料。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp , which is facing a California lawsuit over its alleged role in global plastic waste pollution, will expand plastics recycling that allows it to replace fossil fuels with discarded bottles and bags, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: PayPal 故障影响全球数千人
item.description: 支付公司 PayPal 周四表示，该公司正面临一个系统问题，可能会影响多个产品。【原文：Payments firm PayPal is facing a system issue that may be affecting multiple products, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 肯尼亚取消与阿达尼集团的拟议交易
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）周四表示，他已下令取消扩建肯尼亚主要机场的采购程序，政府正在考虑印度阿达尼集团（Adani Group）的提案。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto said on Thursday he had ordered the cancellation of procurement process to expand the country's main airport, in which the government was considering a proposal by India's Adani Group.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，梅赛德斯计划每年削减成本数十亿欧元
item.description: 据《德国商报》周四援引德国汽车制造商发言人的话报道，梅赛德斯-奔驰计划在未来几年内每年削减数十亿欧元的成本。【原文：Mercedes-Benz plans to cut costs by several billion euros per year in the coming years, the Handelsblatt newspaper reported on Thursday, citing a spokesperson for the German carmaker.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国信达为持有麦当劳中国股份的公司融资 10 亿美元
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，Trustar Capital 已为一个延续基金筹集了 10 亿美元，该基金将持有中国私募股权公司在麦当劳公司中国大陆和香港业务中的控股权。【原文：Trustar Capital has raised $1 billion for a continuation fund that will hold the Chinese private equity firm's controlling stake in McDonald Corp's operations in mainland China and Hong Kong, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 解说员：美国对高塔姆-阿达尼受贿指控的调查结果是什么？
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）已被美国检方起诉，罪名是与一家曾在纽约上市的公司的高管合谋，策划了一项价值 2.65 亿美元的贿赂印度官员的计划，以促进其太阳能业务的发展。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani has been indicted by U.S. prosecutors for conspiring with executives of a formerly New York listed company to devise a $265 million scheme to bribe Indian officials to boost their solar energy business.】

item.title: 早间竞标英伟达实现三位数增长
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国天然气钻探商将提高 2025 年产量，扭转一年来的减产趋势
item.description: 美国天然气生产商在今年进行了一系列减产后，将在 2025 年提高产量，因为液化天然气出口工厂的需求增长有望提高已跌至数十年低点的价格。【原文：U.S. natural gas producers will boost output in 2025 following a series of production cuts this year, as rising demand from liquefied natural gas export plants is expected to increase prices that had fallen to multi-decade lows.】

item.title: 农业设备需求下滑，迪尔预计年度利润低于预期
item.description: 迪尔公司（Deere & Co）周四预测 2025 年的利润将低于街调机构的预期，因为农业收入骤降和通胀压力削弱了对该公司拖拉机和其他农用设备的需求。【原文：Deere & Co forecast 2025 profit below Street expectations on Thursday, as plummeting farm incomes and inflationary pressures dent demand for the company's tractors and other farm equipment.】

item.title: 华尔街等待安进减肥药数据有望推动股价上涨
item.description: 安进公司实验性减肥药MariTide的中期研究数据即将公布，这将揭示MariTide与礼来公司和诺和诺德公司销售的流行GLP-1药物相比有多大优势。【原文：Upcoming data from a mid-stage study of Amgen's experimental weight-loss drug MariTide will shed light on how well it might measure up against the popular GLP-1 drugs sold by Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk .】

item.title: 美国航空公司机组人员对工会寻求更丰厚合同充满信心和愤怒
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空公司的空姐丽贝卡-欧文斯每天工作 10 小时，却只能拿到一半的工资--这是美国航空公司的一项通行政策，即只有在飞机运行时才向乘务员支付工资。欧文斯和成千上万像她一样的乘务员希望改变这种状况。【原文：Alaska Airlines flight attendant Rebecca Owens works 10 hours a day but only gets paid for half that time - a legacy of a common U.S. airline policy to pay cabin crew members only when planes are in motion. Owens, and thousands of cabin crew like her, wants that to change.】

item.title: X 公司前高级政策主管与埃隆-马斯克的竞争对手山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）共事
item.description: 尼克-皮克斯（Nick Pickles）是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 的前全球事务主管，他将与马斯克的竞争对手之一、OpenAI 的联合创始人萨姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）携手合作。【原文：Nick Pickles, the former head of global affairs at Elon Musk's social media platform X, is joining forces with one of Musk's rivals, his fellow OpenAI co-founder Sam Altman.】

item.title: 美国起诉高塔姆-阿达尼涉嫌贿赂案的主要事件
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）因涉嫌参与印度一项价值 2.65 亿美元的贿赂计划而被美国检察官起诉，这使他的企业集团在两年内第二次深陷危机。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani has been indicted by U.S. prosecutors for his alleged role in a $265 million bribery scheme in India, plunging his conglomerate deep into crisis for the second time in two years.】

item.title: 英伟达预测令人失望，纳斯达克期货领跌
item.description: 纳斯达克期货周四领跌美国股指期货，英伟达（Nvidia）股价在盘前交易中下跌，此前投资者对这家人工智能领军企业的营收预期不以为然。【原文：Nasdaq futures led declines among U.S. stock index futures on Thursday, with Nvidia's shares falling in premarket trading after investors were unimpressed by the AI leader's revenue forecast.】

item.title: 在对特朗普关税的担忧中，中国宣布促进贸易的政策措施
item.description: 中国商务部周四宣布了一系列旨在促进中国对外贸易的政策措施，包括承诺加强对企业的融资支持和扩大农产品出口。【原文：China's commerce ministry on Thursday announced a series of policy measures aimed at boosting the country's foreign trade, including pledging to strengthen financing support to firms and expand exports of agricultural products.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：美联储主席巴尔金称美国易受通胀冲击影响
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）周三在接受《金融时报》采访时表示，美国比过去更容易受到通胀冲击的影响。【原文：The U.S. is more vulnerable to inflationary shocks than in the past, Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said in an interview with the Financial Times published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴将电子商务平台整合为单一业务部门
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团周四在提交给证券交易所的文件中表示，将把旗下所有电子商务平台整合为一个单一的业务部门，命名为阿里巴巴电子商务事业群。【原文：Alibaba Group will integrate all of its e-commerce platforms into a single business unit to be called the Alibaba E-commerce Business Group, it said in a stock exchange filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 日产称约 1,000 名美国员工接受提前退休
item.description: 日产汽车公司发言人周四表示，该公司约有 6% 的美国员工接受了提前退休方案，这是这家陷入困境的日本汽车制造商在全球裁员 9000 人计划的一部分。【原文：About 6% of Nissan Motor staff in the United States have accepted early retirement packages, a company spokesperson said on Thursday, as part of the struggling Japanese carmaker's plan to cut 9,000 jobs worldwide.】

item.title: 美国监管机构发布监管大科技支付和数字钱包的最终规则
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）表示，每年通过数字钱包和支付应用程序处理超过 130 亿笔金融交易的硅谷科技巨头和其他公司将接受政府监管。【原文：Silicon Valley tech giants and others who together process more than 13 billion financial transactions annually through digital wallets and payment apps will be subject to government supervision, the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau said.】
